errors.unavailable: wb-device-manager service is unavailable or outdated

labels.scanning-stop: Press "Stop scan", if all devices are found, or wait for completion
labels.first-start:
Scanning has not been performed yet.
Press "Start scan"
labels.extended-modbus: This device was found by scanning via fast Modbus

device_manager.failed_to_scan_error: Scan failed for ports: {{ failed_ports }}. Check logs for more information

labels.confirm-delete-connection: Do you realy want to delete the connection?
labels.main-deprecation-notice: Connections {{connections}} are setup in /etc/network/interfaces. They can be managed by NetworkManager - this is a modern configuration service, support for which is currently being developed in Wiren Board. To switch to NetworkManager, use a pre-defined connections (or create new from scratch) and remove deprecated
labels.main-deprecation-notice_one: Connection {{connections}} is setup in /etc/network/interfaces. It can be managed by NetworkManager - this is a modern configuration service, support for which is currently being developed in Wiren Board. To switch to NetworkManager, use a pre-defined one (or create a new from scratch) and remove deprecated
labels.sticky-connection-period: Deny SIM/Wi-Fi switching period in seconds
labels.sticky-connection-period-desc: The GSM modem can work with only one SIM card. To test connectivity, the current SIM card is disconnected and the tested one is connected. If a modem connection is successfully established with one of the SIM cards, do not switch the SIM card for testing for the specified period. This timeout also applies to Wi-Fi connections which also share a single physical wireless device
labels.connectivity-url-desc: To test connectivity, the service sends an HTTP GET request to specified URL
labels.connectivity-url-error-length: The minimum URL length is {{length}} characters
labels.connectivity-url-error-format: The URL must start with 'http://' or 'https://'
labels.connectivity-payload-desc: Connectivity check response content must contain specified string
labels.switcher-desc: The service will automatically select the highest priority internet connection and route internet traffic through it. All connections except the modem will remain active and can be used for other tasks. The manager checks internet access every 5 seconds.

errors.integer_min: Value must be an integer equal or bigger than {{min}}
errors.integer_max: Value must be an integer equal or less than {{max}}
errors.integer_minmax: Value must be an integer in the range from {{min}} to {{max}}

update.title: Firmware update
update.expandrootfs: Expand rootfs, if firmware supports it
update.backup_first_page:
During update only files stored in /mnt/data are saved. Third-party software like nodered or SH will be removed!

Press Download backup to download a rootfs backup archive, where some useful files like third-party service configs may be stored.

This backup archive currently can't be used to restore Wiren Board state.
update.backup_second_page: Great! Now wait until file is downloaded and press Select firmware file button to begin update process.

errors.unavailable: Firmware update service is not available
errors.stalled: Firmware update stalled, something gone wrong
errors.reboot: It tooks too long to reboot

labels.confirm-remove: Do you really want to remove this dashboard?
